Win BIG for less

Our Gift Competitions are a great way for you to win dream prizes. We award cars, bikes, jewels, tech and more, for the price of a coffee. Buy from us a Fortune Cookie, and receive one entry for free. Be fortunate!

How to enter a prize competition ?

Step1 - Pick an amazing prize and enter the competition.
Step2 - Select a ticket, or let the Lucky Dip selector choose a letter and number for you.
Step3 - Finalize payment. Wait for the Live Draw and be lucky...
   The countdown clock is set to when the draw goes live on Facebook.

How many entries can I have in any competition ?

Each competition can be entered a maximum of 20 times per person, and more per account.
Sometimes we limit this maximum and then we specify this in the competition's description.

How do we draw the winner ?

Gift Competitions uses a totally random ball machine and guarantees that nothing can influence the outcome of a draw.
Each draws is live streamed on Facebook.
